A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A terrible film hiding behind the Star Wars franchise. A messy\, bloated slow moving plot\, out of place humour that is slapstick at time\, cheap furry around the edges blue screen special effects\, no continuity in the cinematography - the colour is all over the place\, throw away characters and not a single \"gasp\" payoff moment! A complete waste that took me from excitement to couldn't care less about Episode 9! All I can say is good luck fixing up this mess J.J.
